alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:41PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Navajo and Coconino Counties between Kaibito and Shonto through 415 PM MDT... At 340 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Inscription House, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Navajo National Monument, Tsegi, Inscription House Landing Strip and Shonto. This includes the following highways... State Route 564 between mile markers 375 and 383. Highway 160 between mile markers 376 and 383. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
